item.title: Vim Skills
item.description: Numbers Link to heading we can use numbers to make command execuate several times. Such as: number + direction/word to “jump”, such as: 7l, 2k, 8w, 4e, number + G to number-th line Navigate Link to heading - % : jump between paired brackets. direction: - h : left - j : down - k : up - l : right word: - w : to the start of next word - b : to beginning of the word - e : to end of the word screen: - H : top of screen - L : bottom of screen line: - 0 : the beginning of the line - $ : the end of the line file: - gg: the beginning of the file

item.title: [Open Cluster Management] multicluster-controlplane
item.description: A demo video introducing stand alone control plane for Open Cluster Management. click here to watch multicluster-controlplane repo
